Both - Yugoslavia and the U.S. were equal, since there was no official 3rd place match in 1930. FIFA decision is controversial as it was made long after 1930 and is not accepted in most countries.

/* Selection of hosts */ Changed tense from future to past for 2010 World Cup

/* World Cups after World War II */

not all tables need to be full width; previous version was more concise, and did not ignore 1970

it is not for us to suppose
